caption.p:
Scatter plot of PCC and Normalized RMSE for ( a) Monsoon, ( b) Tropics and ( c) Global domains. Red, Green and Blue colors represent 2°, 1° and 0.5° resolutions, respectively. We use JJAS mean for monsoon domain and tropical domain, and JJA mean for global domain to correlate with MERRA reanalysis. TRMM data set was used for precipitation in Monsoon and Tropical domains owing to higher accuracy. The various parameters precipitation, T2m, PWAT, EVP, CLDTOT, CLDHGH, CLDMED and CLDLOW represent precipitation, 2 m surface air temperature, precipitable water, surface evaporation, total cloud, high cloud, medium cloud and low cloud, respectively. Figure is created using the NCAR/NCL
52 software version 6.3.0, https://www.ncl.ncar.edu.
